summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Blocks 68, 69, 70 and 71, KILBOURNE'S DIVISION of GREEN LAKE ADDITION, being the alley between Kensington Place and Kirkwood Place from North 56th Street to North 57th Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 16983 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
